channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Explain this financial paradox to me like I’m 16. Why would I, or anyone, lease a car?
item.description: “‘What’s the point of paying thousands of dollars?”

item.title: Broadcom’s stock rises on Google’s spending plans, but Nvidia’s stock extends decline
item.description: Google plans to spend up to $185 billion this year, and analysts say its data-center suppliers stand to benefit.

item.title: My brother refuses to sell our family’s $150K lake house, yet I pay all the bills. Do I push it and risk ruining our relationship?
item.description: ”I have no intention of going back to the lake house, yet he expects me to pay for upkeep and taxes.”

item.title: Hims & Hers launch of compounded $49 Wegovy pill pummels Novo Nordisk’s shares
item.description: The compounded pill is less expensive than the oral version of Wegovy, which costs $149 to get started.

item.title: Job openings sink to a postpandemic low. The economy is barely adding any new jobs.
item.description: The number of job openings in December fell to the lowest level in eight years, excluding the COVID-19 pandemic era, underscoring the fragility of the...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
